issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

components.name: Query Processor
components.description: Tracks issues dealing with query processing.

fields.description:

fields.summary: Join of external tables of elasticsearch giving an error.
